fields.text: Welcome to Prezi in San Francisco, where creating, giving, and tracking beautiful interactive presentations is as easy as one, two, three.
For account and billing inquiries, press [INDEX].
For subscription and plan details, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our subscription team.
For billing, invoices, and payment questions, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press [INDEX].
For help creating or editing your Prezi presentations, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our presentation support specialists.
For assistance with sharing and collaboration features, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our collaboration support team.
